justification: Proposal mostly ignores Team B’s mindset. Robinson offers workload and a friendly playoff schedule—exactly what B values in consistency and SOS—while the incoming pieces (Marcus Reed high-volatility, Trevor Martin deep-threat) misalign with B’s preferences. Labeling Robinson an “upgrade” over a Tier 1 RB is inconsistent with the tiers and A’s ceiling-chasing style. Rationale is thin and one-sided, with little evidence about B’s needs or rankings. The offer is feasible but poorly targeted.
